EmailTemplate.subject: NACS 2022: Find out how NCR can help you virtualize your store
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The latest application virtualization offering is ‘Virtual Fuel’. NCR Software Defined Store (SDS) virtualizes the fuel controller, breaking the dependency between hardware and software to deliver maximum agility and lessen the disruption to the business. Join NCR at NACS 2022 in Booth #5919. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_October_NACS_Retail&utm_content=Email2&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]> We’ll be showcasing how SDS accelerates your journey to a next gen store architecture that enables you to: - Deliver continuous fueling - Extend the life of existing fuel controller hardware for legacy stores - Remove the cost of fuel controller hardware in new stores - Improve reliability and faster return to service with centralized monitoring and remote remediation - Enable software updates without changing the hardware - Deliver a software defined platform to enable migration to Next Gen microservices architecture There’s still time to book an appointment with one of our experts. Schedule your meeting now. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_October_NACS_Retail&utm_content=Email2&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]> Alternatively, ‘Contact US <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/contact-us?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_October_NACS_Retail&utm_content=Email2&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]>’ to find out more information.
